languages.text: {n}Друкари поднимает какой-то предмет с вашего стола и небрежно его оглядывает.{/n} "Мы и мон-кай... различны. И объяснить эту разницу словами не под силу. Ее можно только почувствовать самому. Понять природу истинных эльдар возможно для того, кто примет участие в их ритуалах. Их развлечениях. Их удовольствиях. Ты заявил{mf||а} мне, что тебе интересно познать меня и мой мир. И, раз уж наши судьбы пока связаны, я не вижу причин отказывать тебе в познании. А себе — в мимолетной утехе".

{n}Marazhai picks up an object from your desk and casually examines it.{/n} "We Drukhari and mon-keigh are... different. This difference cannot be explained in words. It can only be felt. Understanding the nature of the true Aeldari is possible only for one who participates in their rituals. Their entertainments. Their pleasures. You told me you were interested in knowing me and my world. Well, since our fates remain intertwined, I see no reason to deny you that knowledge. Or myself a fleeting titillation."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари поднимает какой-то предмет с вашего стола и небрежно его оглядывает.{/n} "Мы и мон-кай... различны. И объяснить эту разницу словами не под силу. languages.text: {n}玛拉斋从你的桌子上拿起了什么东西，漫不经心地端详着。{/n}“我们黑暗灵族与猴子是……截然不同的，这种差异无法通过语言来解释，只能通过实际感觉来认识。只有参加过艾达灵族仪式的人，才能真正了解他们的本质，了解他们的娱乐与消遣。你之前说，你对我和我的世界很感兴趣。既然你我的命运交织在一起，那我没有理由拒绝你的好奇，也没有理由克制我的一时兴起。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai picks up an object from your desk and casually examines it.{/n} "We Drukhari and mon-keigh are... different. This difference cannot be explained in words. It can only be felt. Understanding the nature of the true Aeldari is possible only for one who participates in their rituals. Their entertainments. Their pleasures. You told me you were interested in knowing me and my world. Well, since our fates remain intertwined, I see no reason to deny you that knowledge. Or myself a fleeting titillation."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋从你的桌子上拿起了什么东西，漫不经心地端详着。{/n}“我们黑暗灵族与猴子是……截然不同的，这种差异无法通过语言来解释，只能通过实际感觉来认识。只有参加过艾达灵族仪式的人，才能真正了解他们的本质，了解他们的娱乐与消遣。你之前说，你对我和我的世界很感兴趣。既然你我的命运交织在一起，那我没有理由拒绝你的好奇，也没有理由克制我的一时兴起。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、机から拾い上げたものを何気ないそぶりで観察する。{/n}「俺達デュカーリとモン＝ケイは…別物だ。この違いは言葉で説明できない。感じることしかできないものだ。真のアエルダリの性質の理解は、その儀式に参加した者のみにしかできない。その喜び。その楽しさ。俺の世界を知ってみたいと言ったな。確かに、俺達の運命はいまだに絡み合っている。その思いを否定する理由はない。いや、俺自身、心地良い刺激を感じているんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai picks up an object from your desk and casually examines it.{/n} "We Drukhari and mon-keigh are... different. This difference cannot be explained in words. It can only be felt. Understanding the nature of the true Aeldari is possible only for one who participates in their rituals. Their entertainments. Their pleasures. You told me you were interested in knowing me and my world. Well, since our fates remain intertwined, I see no reason to deny you that knowledge. Or myself a fleeting titillation."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、机から拾い上げたものを何気ないそぶりで観察する。{/n}「俺達デュカーリとモン＝ケイは…別物だ。この違いは言葉で説明できない。感じることしかできないものだ。真のアエルダリの性質の理解は、その儀式に参加した者のみにしかできない。その喜び。その楽しさ。俺の世界を知ってみたいと言ったな。確かに、俺達の運命はいまだに絡み合っている。その思いを否定する理由はない。いや、俺自身、心地良い刺激を感じているんだ」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai recoge algo de tu mesa y lo examina despreocupadamente.{/n} «Los Drukhari y los mon-keigh somos... diferentes. Es una diferencia que no se puede explicar con palabras. Solo se puede sentir. Entender la naturaleza de los verdaderos Aeldari solo es posible al participar en sus ritos. En su entretenimiento. En sus placeres. Dijiste que te interesaría conocernos mejor a mi mundo y a mí. Bueno, puesto que nuestros destinos siguen entrelazados, no veo motivo para negarte el conocimiento. O para renunciar a un breve divertimento».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai picks up an object from your desk and casually examines it.{/n} "We Drukhari and mon-keigh are... different. This difference cannot be explained in words. It can only be felt. Understanding the nature of the true Aeldari is possible only for one who participates in their rituals. Their entertainments. Their pleasures. You told me you were interested in knowing me and my world. Well, since our fates remain intertwined, I see no reason to deny you that knowledge. Or myself a fleeting titillation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai recoge algo de tu mesa y lo examina despreocupadamente.{/n} «Los Drukhari y los mon-keigh somos... diferentes. Es una diferencia que no se puede explicar con palabras. Solo se puede sentir. Entender la naturaleza de los verdaderos Aeldari solo es posible al participar en sus ritos. En su entretenimiento. En sus placeres. Dijiste que te interesaría conocernos mejor a mi mundo y a mí. Bueno, puesto que nuestros destinos siguen entrelazados, no veo motivo para negarte el conocimiento. O para renunciar a un breve divertimento».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai prend un objet sur votre bureau et l'examine avec attention.{/n} « Nous autres Drukharis sommes bien différents des mon-keigh. C'est une distinction qui ne s'explique pas. Seule l'expérience permet d'en prendre conscience. Pour comprendre la nature profonde des Aeldaris, il convient de prendre part à leurs rituels. À leurs divertissements. À leurs jeux. Vous avez exprimé votre intérêt pour mon monde et moi-même, et puisque nos destins restent intimement liés, je ne vois pas de raison de vous priver de cette découverte. Ni de me priver, moi, de cette fugace ivresse des sens. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai picks up an object from your desk and casually examines it.{/n} "We Drukhari and mon-keigh are... different. This difference cannot be explained in words. It can only be felt. Understanding the nature of the true Aeldari is possible only for one who participates in their rituals. Their entertainments. Their pleasures. You told me you were interested in knowing me and my world. Well, since our fates remain intertwined, I see no reason to deny you that knowledge. Or myself a fleeting titillation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai prend un objet sur votre bureau et l'examine avec attention.{/n} « Nous autres Drukharis sommes bien différents des mon-keigh. C'est une distinction qui ne s'explique pas. Seule l'expérience permet d'en prendre conscience. Pour comprendre la nature profonde des Aeldaris, il convient de prendre part à leurs rituels. À leurs divertissements. À leurs jeux. Vous avez exprimé votre intérêt pour mon monde et moi-même, et puisque nos destins restent intimement liés, je ne vois pas de raison de vous priver de cette découverte. Ni de me priver, moi, de cette fugace ivresse des sens. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai greift nach einem Objekt auf deinem Schreibtisch und betrachtet es beiläufig.{/n} "Wir Drukhari und die Chem-Pan-Sey sind ... verschieden. Unsere Verschiedenheit lässt sich nicht in Worte fassen. Sie kann nur gefühlt werden. Das wahre Wesen der Aeldari lässt sich nur bei einem ihrer Rituale ergründen. Ihrer Unterhaltungsformen. Ihrer Vergnügungen. Ihr habt mir gesagt, dass Ihr Interesse daran habt, mich und meine Welt kennenzulernen. Und da unsere Schicksale so miteinander verwoben sind, sehe ich keinen Grund, Euch dieses Wissen vorzuenthalten. Oder mir selbst etwas flüchtige Unterhaltung zu verschaffen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai picks up an object from your desk and casually examines it.{/n} "We Drukhari and mon-keigh are... different. This difference cannot be explained in words. It can only be felt. Understanding the nature of the true Aeldari is possible only for one who participates in their rituals. Their entertainments. Their pleasures. You told me you were interested in knowing me and my world. Well, since our fates remain intertwined, I see no reason to deny you that knowledge. Or myself a fleeting titillation."

Unsere Verschiedenheit lässt sich nicht in Worte fassen. Sie kann nur gefühlt werden. Das wahre Wesen der Aeldari lässt sich nur bei einem ihrer Rituale ergründen. Ihrer Unterhaltungsformen. Ihrer Vergnügungen. Ihr habt mir gesagt, dass Ihr Interesse daran habt, mich und meine Welt kennenzulernen. Und da unsere Schicksale so miteinander verwoben sind, sehe ich keinen Grund, Euch dieses Wissen vorzuenthalten. Oder mir selbst etwas flüchtige Unterhaltung zu verschaffen."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, masandan bir nesne alarak onu gelişigüzel inceliyor.{/n} "Biz, yani Drukhariler ile mon-keighler... Farklıdır. Bu fark, kelimelerle anlatılamaz. Yalnızca hissedilebilir. Gerçek bir Aeldari'nin tabiatını kavramak, yalnızca ayinlerine katılanlar için mümkündür. Eğlencelerine, zevklerine... Beni ve dünyamı tanımakla ilgilendiğini söylemiştin. Kaderlerimiz birbirine dolanmış bir hâldeyken senden bu irfanı, kendimden de bu anlık zevkin tadını çıkarmayı esirgemek için bir neden göremiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai picks up an object from your desk and casually examines it.{/n} "We Drukhari and mon-keigh are... different. This difference cannot be explained in words. It can only be felt. Understanding the nature of the true Aeldari is possible only for one who participates in their rituals. Their entertainments. Their pleasures. You told me you were interested in knowing me and my world. Well, since our fates remain intertwined, I see no reason to deny you that knowledge. Or myself a fleeting titillation."
